General.Name: Ene Technology Inc
General.Description: ENE Technology Inc. engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of electronic products, information software, and circuit design services in China, Taiwan, and internationally. The company offers its embedded controllers for mobile devices; embedded micro controllers; peripherals; tools for product design and development; technical support services for product design; and wireless chargers. ENE Technology Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 21, Lixing Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
